page.description: The .SELECT() method selects text in an RTF field.
page.syntax: .SELECT( Start_Position as N, Length as N )

argument.name: Start_Position
argument.description: The beginning position of the selection. Position 1 is before the first character in the control. Position 0 selects all text in the control.

argument.name: Length
argument.description: The number of characters to select.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example selects 5 characters beginning at position 4 in an RTF field in an open form.
section.example: dim obj as P obj = :Customer_Information:rtfmemofield.this obj.rtf.set_cursor(1) obj.rtf.insert_text("This is RTF text") obj.rtf.select(4,5)
